title: Konji Pesida Venaam Lyrics Sethupathi Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Konji Pesida Venaam Song Lyrics From Sethupathi 
Singer: K.S.Chitra, Sriram Parthasaarathy
Lyrics: Na Muthukumar

Konji pesida venaam
un kannae pesuthadi

konjamaaga paarthaa
mazha saaral veesuthadi

naan ninna nadandhaa kanne
un mugamae ketkudhadi

ada tholaivula 
irundhaa thaane
perung kadhal koodudhadi

dhooramey dhooramaai
pogum neram.

Konji pesida venaam
un kannae pesuthadaa
konjamaaga paarthaa
mazha saaral veesuthadaa

naan ninna nadandhaa kanne
un mugamae ketkudhadaa

ada tholaivula 
irundhaa thaana
perung kadhal koodudhadaa

dhooramey dhooramaai
pogum neram.

aasa valayiduthaa
nenjam adhil viludhaa
ezhundhidum podhum anbae
meendum vilundhidudhaa

thanimai unai sududhaa
ninaivil anal tharudhaa
thalayanai pookkalilellaam
koondhal manam varudhaa

kuru paarvayaal
konjam kadaththuraye

kulirukkum neruppukkum
naduvula niruthiriye

veru enna venum
neril vara venum
sathamilla muththam
tharavenum.

Konji pesida venaam
un kannae pesuthadi

konjamaaga paarthaa
mazha saaral veesuthadaa

naan ninna nadandhaa kanne
un mugamae ketkudhadi

ada tholaivula 
irundhaa thaana
perung kadhal koodudhadaa

dhooramey dhooramaai
pogum neram.

Konji pesida venaam
un kannae pesuthadaa
konjamaaga paarthaa
mazha saaral veesuthadaa
